description:
By a Dangerous Man series
Author: Cleo Peitsche 



Book 1: Trapped by a Dangerous Man

What does she owe to the man who saved her life?

Despite growing up a bounty hunter, being taken seriously is a constant struggle for 24-year-old Audrey Stroop. When she stumbles across information on Corbin Lagos, she recognizes the chance of a lifetime.

One blizzard and a car accident later, she wakes up in gorgeous CorbinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bed. She doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know how heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll react if he discovers that the woman he rescued intends to haul him in. She also canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t fight her attraction to him.

HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s nothing like the men she typically seduces and discards. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dominant. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dangerous. And heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s going to explode her life into a million tiny pieces.




Book 2: Wanted by a Dangerous Man

Bounty hunter Audrey knows that Corbin Lagos isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t her soul mate. He may have saved her life, but heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a coldblooded killer, wanted for crimes that he neither excuses nor denies. Yet every time she crawls out of his bed, the line separating legal and illegal seems to have moved.


As a rival bounty hunter closes in on Corbin, Audrey must decide how far sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s willing to go to protect her secret lover, and an unexpected confession reveals that CorbinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s far more dangerous than sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d ever realized.


This erotic romance contains graphic language that may be objectionable to some readers. Includes sexual dominance and submission and other BDSM elements. 




Book 3: Saved by a Dangerous Man

SAVED BY A DANGEROUS MAN is an erotic romance novella of 36,500 words. 

As Audrey struggles to keep CorbinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s identity secret, the rest of her life spins out of control. Rival bounty hunter Henry suspects sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s playing him for information, changes at work leave her stunned, and her father crosses her one time too many.
Audrey doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t approve of what Corbin is, but he proves that heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been paying close attention to what she needs. When an unexpected situation explodes, Corbin can reassure her, but only the other Corbin, the one with secrets and a dark past, can save her.

This BDSM romance contains explicit sexual content and graphic language that may be objectionable to some readers. For adults only. 




Book 4: Tempted by a Dangerous Man

TEMPTED BY A DANGEROUS MAN is an erotic romance of 41,000 words.

As Audrey struggles with her role in a recent tragedy, Corbin answers questions that have long haunted her. She is unsettled to learn what happened to the other Audrey and how Corbin became a killer.

Meanwhile, events at home take an unexpected turn, leading Audrey to reevaluate her feelings for her estranged father, and bounty hunter HenryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s obsessions push Audrey and Corbin into a series of impossible positions.




Book 5: Seduced by a Dangerous Man

SEDUCED BY A DANGEROUS MAN (#5) is an erotic romance of 57,000 words. Contains mild BDSM elements.

When Corbin doesn't return from his latest assignment, Audrey blames and punishes herself, convinced she pushed him away. Fed up with the lack of control in her life, she and her twin brother devise a risky plan to get rid of the manipulative Henry once and for all.

But Corbin's return changes everything, and Audrey must decide if she can accept the things Corbin has done to buy their happiness.

Please note that this book is about twice the length of the first in the series. It is the last episode of Season One, and there are no cliffhangers.

This erotic suspense romance contains explicit sexual content and graphic language that may be objectionable to some readers. Includes sexual dominance and submission, bondage, spanking, and many other delights. For adults only.
